title: HAP 04 - Pyramid Schemes - Philosophy in Ancient Egypt
itunes:title: HAP 04 - Pyramid Schemes - Philosophy in Ancient Egypt
description: Ancient Egyptian figures and writings including the Pyramid Texts, Imhotep, and the "first monotheist" Akhenaten reflect on the nature of things and questions of morality.
content:encoded: Ancient Egyptian figures and writings including the Pyramid Texts, Imhotep, and the "first monotheist" Akhenaten reflect on the nature of things and questions of morality.

itunes:summary: Ancient Egyptian figures and writings including the Pyramid Texts, Imhotep, and the "first monotheist" Akhenaten reflect on the nature of things and questions of morality.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
